summary: Iteration 53 - Analytics page, news caching, connection pooling, and frontend features all working. All backend tests passed (10/10). Frontend features verified: Analytics page at /analytics, mobile viewport zero overflow, PLAY_ALL button, queue drag handles, network status indicator, sidebar Analytics nav item.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Backend /api/analytics/guest returns total_listens, categories, daily_activity, streak, sources, top_categories
PASS: News response caching (120s TTL) - _news_response_cache implemented at line 417
PASS: MongoDB connection pooling (maxPoolSize=20) at line 20-27
PASS: Voice defaults are 'emma' (YarnGPT) - verified in UserSettings model and all endpoints
PASS: /api/briefing/generate uses yarngpt_service with voice_id='emma' default
PASS: Frontend Analytics page renders at /analytics with stat cards (LISTENS, MINUTES, STREAK, TOP)
PASS: Analytics page has DAILY_ACTIVITY chart, CATEGORIES breakdown, TOP_SOURCES section
PASS: Desktop sidebar has Analytics nav item (sidebar-analytics data-testid)
PASS: Network status indicator present in header (data-testid='network-status')
PASS: Mobile viewport (375x667) Dashboard - body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO overflow
PASS: Mobile viewport (375x667) History - body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO overflow
PASS: PLAY_ALL button in FOR_YOU section works (data-testid='play-all-recommendations')
PASS: Queue panel has DotsSixVertical drag handles for reordering (line 110 in AudioPlayerBar.js)
PASS: Queue shows '5 TRACKS' after clicking PLAY_ALL
PASS: DashboardLayout motion.div has 'min-w-0 overflow-hidden' preventing mobile overflow
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 53 features working. Analytics page at /analytics shows listening stats, category breakdown, daily activity chart, and source breakdown. News response caching with 120s TTL reduces RSS fetching. MongoDB connection pooling with maxPoolSize=20. Queue drag-to-reorder uses HTML5 native drag-and-drop with DotsSixVertical handles. Tour modal appears on first visit - dismiss with SKIP_TOUR button. Voice defaults are 'emma' (YarnGPT) throughout.

analytics_endpoint.notes: GET /api/analytics/guest returns all required fields: total_listens, categories, daily_activity, streak, sources, top_categories

news_caching.notes: 120s TTL cache reduces RSS fetching - _news_response_cache at line 417

analytics_stat_cards.notes: 4 stat cards: LISTENS, MINUTES, STREAK, TOP - all have data-testid

analytics_sections.notes: DAILY_ACTIVITY chart, CATEGORIES breakdown, TOP_SOURCES section present

sidebar_analytics_nav.notes: Desktop sidebar has Analytics nav item with data-testid='sidebar-analytics'

network_status_indicator.notes: Header has network status with data-testid='network-status'

mobile_dashboard_overflow.notes: body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO horizontal overflow

mobile_history_overflow.notes: body=375px, viewport=375px, diff=0px - NO horizontal overflow

play_all_button.notes: data-testid='play-all-recommendations' works - adds tracks to queue

queue_drag_handles.notes: DotsSixVertical icons in queue items, cursor-grab class for drag functionality
